abstract: Eric T. Schneiderman, New York’s attorney general, has sent letters to 20 employers seeking information on the prepaid cards, whose fees can eat into an hourly worker’s pay.
snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman, New York’s attorney general, has sent letters to 20 employers seeking information on the prepaid cards, whose fees can eat into an hourly worker’s pay.
lead_paragraph: New York’s top prosecutor is investigating some of the state’s largest employers over their use of A.T.M.-style cards to pay their hourly employees.

headline.main: Payroll Cards Are Under Scrutiny by New York’s Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Payroll Cards Are Under Scrutiny By New York’s Attorney General
